column1: I will  first address  the  application  of the Respondent to accept document marked

column2: RX as  part of the record.  RX  is the proceedings dated 17.08.2009 of customs inquiry

column1: case  no.  POM/822/2009 . The  said  inquiry  pertains  to  the  importation  of a  used
BMW  car  which  was  brought  to  Sri  Lanka  under  what
certificate"  by  a person  which  was  not re-exported  within the validity  period  and
kept in the custody of that person without paying the due levies to the customs.
